column5: The MSc in Criminal Investigation develops your knowledge of key aspects of contemporary criminal investigation.We live in a world where issues in criminal investigation take centre stage in the media - just think of cases like that of Sarah Everard or Liam Allen. Throughout this course, you will be able to gain a thorough understanding of best practice and challenges of known but also lesser-known topics, through a combined academic and practitioner perspective.It is available as a full time, as well as part time course, suitable for current professionals and new entrants into the area of criminal investigation alike.
